package.name: SellerActive
package.summary: Strategically price, manage, and fulfill your orders in your Magento store and on other marketplaces.
package.description:
Competitive Pricing
 • Market-based repricing tools. Automatically react and adjust to your industry's pricing trends.
 • Customized and complex pricing strategies. Hold the lowest or average price, or construct your own algorithm.
 • Fast, unlimited updates. Adjust prices as often as needed with no limits or transaction fees.
 • Group pricing. Apply the same strategy to products by category, so there's no need to go through each product.

Consolidated Order Management
 • Multi-channel integrated dashboard. Manage incoming orders from every marketplace.
 • Design and print packing slips. Automatically print custom-designed packing slips when you're ready to ship.
 • Customer confirmation. Push notifications and shipping numbers back to the marketplace.
 • FBA integration. Fulfill orders using your FBA inventory with a click.

Automatic Carrier Rate Shopping
 • The best shipping option automatically. Shop rates and purchase with one-scan-and-click.
 • Adaptable shipping rules. Set qualifications for expedited shipping and other special exceptions.
 • Flat-rate pricing. Available at a fixed monthly rate.

How to Get Started
1. Click "Install Now" to begin installing.
2. Sign up for a 30 day free trial of SellerActive Inventory Management or Order Management.
 (Note: Signing up for Inventory Management grants free access to Order Management as well.)
3. From the SellerActive dashboard, under Orders, click "Manage Sales Channels".
4. Select Magento from the "Site Integration" list on the left.
5. Follow on-screen instructions.

If you have any issues please do not hesitate to contact our customer support.
